title: The Stock Market Cares About Climate Change — Even if Some People Don’t
text:
On Friday, hundreds of thousands of young people—and maybe a few adults as well—skipped out on what they were supposed to be doing for a Global Climate Strike. And whether we agree with their goals, which can seem unfocused and unrealistic at times, we need to pay attention because the stock market is listening.

In a report released this past week, Deutsche Bank quantified just how much climate change matters. According to its research, stocks that reported positive climate-change news outperformed the MSCI World Index by...
description: According to Deutsche Bank, stocks that reported positive climate-change news outperformed the MSCI World Index by 0.8 percentage point a year over a 12-year period.
